daemon-start:
bootaddr=$($CLI keys show $chainid-bootstrap -a --keyring-backend=test 2>/dev/null || { $CLI keys add $chainid-bootstrap --keyring-backend=test; $CLI keys show $chainid-bootstrap -a -keyring-backend=test; })
echo bootaddr=$bootaddr, $chainid
DEBUG=$CONFIG BOOT_ADDRESS=$bootaddr $DAEMON --home "$DAEMON_HOME" start --pruning=nothing
